query:
SELECT 
  v.id as vendaId,
  v.dataVenda,
  v.valorTotal,
  p.id as pagamentoId,
  p.tipo,
  p.valor,
  p.cvNsu,
  p.bandeira,
  p.parcelas,
  DATE(v.dataVenda) as dataVendaFormatada
FROM vendas v
INNER JOIN pagamentos p ON p.vendaId = v.id
WHERE p.cvNsu = '176726822'
LIMIT 5;
